author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Interesting stream :_ハート:
I love the BGM at beginning, the same as "Rushia's Cooking — St. Valentine's special"

And also that game was a test of reactions and skills.

The most Kusaful part was the 0:58:43 when character fly away with only stepping at rock.

At 1:03:29, Mario Kart's memories, but with a Turtle and a Bunny... When Bunny gets hit, LiveChat started to say "Pain Peko" (Allusion at Pekora, but not only runs around her or entire Hololive, also in other Vtuber horizons like Animare with "Rushia's sister" Shiromiya Mimi would be read)

And last gaming was dodging people... Best score was 260 points. :_ちょうちょ:

Definitively is a game designed for her, due to high content of quiz and thrill... And also caused her tons of laughing moments :_るんるん:

author: Vyse
text:
Thank you, Rushia! This stream was very fun and hilarious. I laughed so much. Thank you for the fun time Rushia! Rest well!
My favorite time stamps.
